title: Stage Lv8-C1-S05
description: Level 8 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: If I were to accept the offer, would you support me?
Should he have been more careful, the accident wouldn't have happened.
learning_points: Level 8 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 제가 그 제안을 받아들인다면 저를 지지해 주시겠습니까?
sentences.en: If I were to accept the offer, would you support me?

sentences.kr: 그가 더 조심했더라면 사고가 일어나지 않았을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Should he have been more careful, the accident wouldn't have happened.

sentences.kr: 당신의 도움이 없었다면 결코 성공할 수 없었을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Were it not for your help, I would never have succeeded.

sentences.kr: 만약 그가 진실을 말했다면 상황이 달라졌을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Had he told the truth, the situation would have been different.

sentences.kr: 제가 그 자리에 있었다면 다르게 행동했을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Were I to have been there, I would have acted differently.

sentences.kr: 비가 오지 않았다면 소풍을 갈 수 있었을 텐데요.
sentences.en: Should it not have rained, we could have gone on a picnic.

sentences.kr: 그들이 미리 계획했더라면 더 나은 결과를 얻었을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Had they planned ahead, they would have achieved better results.

sentences.kr: 기술이 발달하지 않았다면 이런 일은 불가능했을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Were technology not to have advanced, this would have been impossible.
